name: @chemistry/functions-cod-sync-start-instance
description: Cloud functions that start COD sync instances by schedule

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy codSyncStartInstance --runtime nodejs10 --project crystallography-api --source ./dist --trigger-topic cod-sync-schedule-instance-start --region europe-west1 --set-env-vars GCP_SA_KEY=$(echo $GCP_SA_KEY),GCP_BOTO_KEY=$(echo $GCP_BOTO_KEY)
